title: Take any two or more champions and create a funny scenerio with them.
body:
Rules are simple.
You can use any champion to your heart's content.
The champions cannot have any ability that does not exist in the game.
Champions are allowed any item that is within the game.
Champions can have any skin that is in the game for them.

Here's a rather bad example.

{{champion:106}} stands in a grassy clearing with a forest behind him. He points to a group of children and states, "Only you can prevent forest fires!" {{champion:17}} runs by screaming with {{champion:102}} chasing him through the trees in dragon form and Burnout active, setting the forest on fire. {{champion:18}} Runs by in her firefighter skin and yells, "Oh gawd! We need more water!"

replies.body:
{{champion:55}}  Merry Christmas, sister!
{{champion:69}} ...
{{champion:55}} I see you've received my present.
{{champion:69}} {{item:3020}}  Curse you.

Pool Party {{champion:115}} throws a pool party (naturally), and he (of course) invites Pool Party {{champion:58}} , {{champion:104}} , {{champion:64}} , and {{champion:89}} .

They are having a great time, when Ziggs, caught in the moment and not thinking, throws his rubber ducky into the pool. Graves and Leona scramble out, but Lee can't find the stairs (he's better on flat ground). With only two seconds left, Renekton dashes in to save Lee. Meanwhile Graves has run to find his gun so he can try to shoot the ducky out of the pool. He fumbles and accidentally activates smokescreen! Lee's death, as well as Renekton's at this piont, seems certain. With less than a second left Leona surfs through the smoke on her shield with Eclipse activated and grabs Lee and Renekton. The pool blows up and Ziggs is left with a hefty fine. Leona looks at them all, tips down her sunglasses and says with a wink, "Ever vigilant."
lol! Nice one!

{{champion:8}}  is on a murderous rampage, so {{champion:51}}  sends an elite team to stop him before he reaches Piltover. {{champion:8}}  laughs when he discovers it's only {{champion:29}}  {{champion:6}}  {{champion:27}} and {{champion:36}} , and begins to siphon all their blood into himself. He immediately dies from various blood infections and diseases.

[All] {{champion:51}} : Calculated.
Actually, he controls blood like a weapon, but he doesn't drink it. He siphons life energy in his lore and it's why he has soul stealer skin. Still funny doe :)
xD He's one of the lores I don't care about since the retcon. He revived Sion and is Black Rose now? I have no clue wassup with him xD
Meh well, i'm no entirely sure what's up with tryndamere and attrox either so you have a point.

{{champion:17}} Dodges the attack!

{{champion:17}} USE BLIND!

{{champion:64}} is blinded!

LOL! I love the pokemon refferense!
You are supposed to take two or more champions and make a funny scenario. Braum only counts as one I'm afraid. But that is a LOT of shields lol!

{{champion:12}} eats some grass.
{{champion:143}} and {{champion:57}} stare in horror.
---
{{champion:60}} and {{champion:121}} meet.
Who will win?
the cow. a duuh. he smacks the two bugs away with his tail.
Elise vs. Kha is a separate scenario from the Alistar one.

Lucian and Thresh move into an apartment complex on the same day, and end up in apartments next to each other.
The only thing that stops them from constantly being at each others' throats is that Vi is their landlord.
She's a terrible landlord (doesn't take the job seriously), but has no trouble stopping fights the only way she knows how - with her fists!

Cue zany soap opera hijinks.

{{champion:103}} : You think you can win over us in a beauty contest?
{{champion:21}} : Don't embarrass yourself sweetie, just give up now.
{{champion:421}} : ...
{{champion:103}} Fine then, stay. You don't have any eyes, but I bet you'll be crying!

{{champion:119}} : And now to introduce our judges for the contest!
{{champion:31}} {{champion:72}} {{champion:121}} 

{{champion:103}} {{champion:21}} : $%^#!!
lol

{{champion:51}}  and {{champion:254}}  are chasing {{champion:222}}  trough the jungle, {{champion:222}} throws her flame chomper cutting off the narrow path, both {{champion:254}}  and {{champion:51}} flash over without hesitation, but they get feared by 5 jack in the boxes, they walk backwards into the chompers and take all 5 box dmg plus {{champion:222}}  ult, {{champion:35}} leaves stealth and laughs hystercally , then as he wipes a tear from his eye he raises his hand to high five {{champion:222}}  but she grabs him by the collar and french kisses him (she does that alot) after the kiss {{champion:35}} 's usually white mask becomes red and he faints, {{champion:222}} then skips trough the bush while the announcer exclaims she has scored a triple kill.
lol!
Pick {{champion:72}} and play Legend of the Poro king, once you ult some one press {{summoner:30}} WEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE!! >:D

A better one for the OP's example

{{champion:106}} : Only you can prevent forest fires
{{champion:1}} : *summons Tibers* You smell like burning *giggles*

{{champion:48}} is able to escape a teamfight with less than 200 hp left and walks to his base.
So the enemy {{champion:80}} channels his 'Grand Skyfall', to secure the kill on {{champion:48}} .
But {{champion:48}} creates a 'Pillar of Ice' directly in the area where {{champion:80}} is supposed to land and he continues to walk to his base with an evil evil laugh...
AN ENEMY HAS BEEN SLAIN (que moans or pleasure from pantheon)

{{champion:90}} and {{champion:38}} argue over {{champion:421}}'s random appearance. 
Meanwhile, the ~~Zz'rot~~ Portal is growing right under the surface..

Someone points a finger at Eternum {{champion:56}}...
No, {{champion:266}} just wants his sword back.

{{champion:89}} finds a cookbook and decides to try out a few recipes, inviting {{champion:80}} and {{champion:104}} over to sample her creations. Much to her shock, however, both Pantheon and Graves end up with severe cases of food poisoning. Leona soon ends up bursting into tears due to the criticisms on her cooking, and that her creations might be poisonous. A moment later, {{champion:96}} shows up and ends up eating everything, enjoying the taste to Leona's delight.
The mafia skinned champs rob a bank. Constable trundle hits them with his club but is out numbered. Super teeming flys down and stops them.
